rule:
---
apiVersion: "io.jetic.jetalert/v1"
kind: "JetAlertRule"
metadata:
    name: "test"
    labels:
        jetic.io/jetalert.uuid: "42018db3-6a5f-4743-ab2c-ae9c22cff836"
spec:
    rule: |-
      # Example of JetAlert Rule
      type: frequency
      name: test
      index: jetic-messages
      num_events: 1
      timeframe:
         minutes: 60
      filter:
       - query:
           query_string:
             query: "*"
      sort_by: "timestamp"
      alert:
        - "debug"
name: test
